com.intrasonics

Class Decoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intrasonics.Decoder

  • public class Decoder
extends java.lang.Object
    The Intrasonics Decoder class. All direct interactions with the Decoder are through this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.intrasonics.IConfigurationParameter> configuration)

      Disconnect a listener from a Decoder Engine.

      Get the file path for use by a specific plugin

      Singleton accessor method.

      Check whether the Decoder has failed.

      Check whether the Decoder is idle (not decoding).

      Check whether the Decoder is listening (decoding).

      Register a Decoder listener to receive updates when the decoder changes state or confidence.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Decoder getInstance()
        Singleton accessor method.
        Returns:
        The single instance of the Decoder

      • getFilePathForPlugin

        public java.lang.String getFilePathForPlugin(java.lang.String pluginName)
        Get the file path for use by a specific plugin
        Parameters:
        pluginName - The name of the plugin to find the path for.

      • setApplicationContext

        public void setApplicationContext(Context context)
        Set the application context for the Decoder. This should be called once, normally from the application's main activity, as soon as a reference to the Decoder singleton has been obtained.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(DecoderListener listener)
        Register a Decoder listener to receive updates when the decoder changes state or confidence.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to register

      • unRegisterListener

        public void unRegisterListener(DecoderListener listener)
        Unregister a Decoder listener. If the supplied object is not registered as a listener, this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to unregister

      • connectEngineListener

        public IEngine connectEngineListener(IEngineListener listener,
                                     java.lang.Class<? extends IEngine> engineType)
        Instantiate a Decoder Engine, and connects a listener object to it. This should be called after setToken, otherwise no Engines will be authorized and the return value will always be null.
        Parameters:
        listener - The engine listener that will receive Engine events
        engineType - The engine type to disconnect from
        Returns:
        The engine connected to, or null if the engine is not authorized by the current token

      • disconnectFromEngine

        public void disconnectFromEngine(IEngineListener listener,
                                 IEngine engine)
        Disconnect a listener from a Decoder Engine.
        Parameters:
        listener - The engine listener to disconnect
        engine - The engine to disconnect from

      • startDecoding

        public void startDecoding()
        Start decoding.

      • startDecoding

        public void startDecoding(boolean shouldRecord)
        Start decoding.

      • stopDecoding

        public void stopDecoding()
        Stop decoding.

      • configure

        public void configure(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.intrasonics.IConfigurationParameter> configuration)
        Configure the decoder

      • isIdle

        public boolean isIdle()
        Check whether the Decoder is idle (not decoding).
        Returns:
        True if the Decoder is currently idle (not decoding)

      • isListening

        public boolean isListening()
        Check whether the Decoder is listening (decoding).
        Returns:
        True if the Decoder is listening

      • hasFailed

        public boolean hasFailed()
        Check whether the Decoder has failed.
        Returns:
        True if the Decoder has failed

      • setToken

        public boolean setToken(java.lang.String newToken)
        Pass a Decoder licence token to the Decoder.
        Parameters:
        newToken - The new token.
        Returns:
        true if setting the token succeeded and the token was valid
